comment.author: 35607158@N06
comment._content: I guess actually Flemish milk wagon. Dog drawn I see. And the chap in uniform does not so much look like he is making a purchase as he is noting something down. Perhaps he is an inspector of some sort?

comment.author: 10129697@N08
comment._content: Getting a ticket for parking, or not being in possession of a licence to sell unpastuerised milk?
